itemDesc: The Cometa T2-9 boasts remarkable stopping power for a sidearm. This Estrellan mainstay has lived through several generations due to its fine craftsmanship design.
Standard ammunition for revolvers.
Standard-issue Warden rifle. This bolt-action firearm is as robust as they come and has seen over a century of use on the battlefield.

The Blakerow is a carbine with a high rate of fire compared to its bolt-action predecessor. This increased fire rate does come at the cost of innate stopping power; however, its versatility and lightweight frame more than makes up for any perceived shortcomings.

The primary infantry rifle of the Colonial legion. Its predecessor, the Volta repeater, was a sturdy, reliable firearm but had many limitations, namely, fire rate. The Argenti solves this limitation as well as being more compact and lightweight.
This unique rifle fires three rounds in rapid succession. The Fuscina is the first of its kind, designed for laying down suppressive fire during assaults on fortified enemy entrenchments.
Standard ammunition for rifles.
The Fiddler Submachine gun is a widely used urban combat weapon. Its high rate of fire and compact frame makes it ideal for close-quarters engagements.
This unique, heavy-duty submachine gun is not very useful on the run, but with careful aim and adequate cover, becomes a razorblade in the night.

This classic submachine gun is sturdy and irreplaceable as a general tool for close-range engagements. The "Pitch Gun" earned its namesake from Mesean sailors who employed the weapon to successfully defend against a night raid on the Geraston docks.
A heavier, modern variation of the Pitch Gun, the Lionclaw Performs well as a decent, all-around submachine gun designed as a primary firearm in urban and close-quarters combat operations.
Standard ammunition for submachine guns.
This close-range firearm is an Estrellan import originally designed for hunting wild game. The Brasa is primarily used in urban operations.
Standard ammunition for Shotguns.
Widely considered to be the first storm rifle, the Aalto is a marvel in Caoivish engineering. With its two fire modes, it can be used as a rapid-fire assault weapon or a mid-range rifle.
The Booker is a high-impact three-round burst Storm Rifle for those who like to shoot first.
A titanic light machine gun capable of scattering infantry lines with ease, the Catara is a modern weapon for the modern Colonial.
This unique assault rifle includes a high-capacity drum magazine designed for sustained rapid fire.
Standard ammunition for storm rifles, light machine guns, and armored cars.

A heavy-duty, long-range marksman rifle. The Clancy-Raca has one hell of a kick but is fitted with a powerful scope, allowing infantry to survey the battlefield and provide support from a safe location.

A Kraunian rifle modified for long-range engagements. It doesn't have the range or stopping power of other marksman rifles but more than makes up for it with unmatched reliability in a range of environments and a superior effective rate of fire.
Standard ammunition for sniper rifles.
A standard smoke grenade designed for concealing allied movement or screening the enemy's vision.

This unique sidearm fires in three-round bursts. The Cascadier may not have the stopping power of its cousins, but it more than makes up for it with its lightweight frame, concealability, and fire rate.
Standard ammunition for pistols.
The Gast is a deadly but cumbersome Kraunian heavy machine gun. It is best suited to holding and defending established fortifications or garrisoned structures against encroaching infantry.
Standard ammunition for all machine guns, including vehicle mounted weapons like those on the half-track and battle tank.
This short-range cannon is designed to bombard enemy infantry with indirect fire.
ammoUsed: Mortar Shell, Mortar Shrapnel Shell, Mortar Flare Shell

itemDesc: An explosive projectile fired from a mortar.
A shell that explodes into shrapnel on impact, devastating nearby infantry.
A shell that ignites midair and illuminates a large area, revealing enemy targets.
Green ash is an asphyxiating toxin. Inhaling it without protection will result in a quick death. Be sure to wear a gas mask with fresh filters when handling green ash.
The Cutler Launcher is capable of firing and unguided, rocket-propelled grenade over short distances with startling efficiency. Its simple design allows for easy deployment and storage.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.

itemDesc: An explosive projectile fired from an R.P.G.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.

itemDesc: An adherable grenade designed to penetrate heavy tank armor. The sticky bomb can only be thrown a short distance and is ineffective against structures.
damageDesc: High chance of disabling Track subsystem

itemDesc: An explosive flask used for melting enemy armor. This carefully designed liquid bomb explodes into a dazzling flash of molten debris upon impact.
damageDesc: High chance of disabling Track subsystem

itemDesc: This densely packed, high-explosive grenade is designed to damage structures and vehicles.
The Neville is unmatched in its versatility as a portable, magazine-based anti-armor firearm.
Standard ammunition for anti-tank rifles.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.

itemDesc: Payload for light artillery weapons.
Payload for heavy artillery weapons.

This anti-personnel fragmentation grenade is designed with pull-pin mechanics and a time fuse for user safety. Serrations in the casing allow for a better grip and increased fragmentation effectiveness.
Standard payload for light tanks.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.

itemDesc: An anti-tank shell that's effective against penetrating tank armor.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.
vehiclePenChance: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: A shell that is launched over short distances by a spigot mortar.
The payload for ballistic rockets. A high yield bomb that delivers over 3 tons of TNT and is capable of leveling an entire village or town block.
Payload for the storm cannon.
This heavy infantry cannon requires a tripod for stability. The Daucus is designed to give infantry a foothold against enemy vehicles and light fortifications or established fortified garrisons.
Standard explosive shell for small vehicles or infantry weapons.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.

itemDesc: This heavy machine gun is bulky enough to require a steady surface to maintain stability. The Malone series of machine guns are unmatched defenders on the battlefield.
An anti-tank projectile fired from indirect R.P.G. weapons.
vehiclePen: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: The pride of the Warden anti-armored arsenal, the Bonesaw Mk.3 has one job; to cut through heavy metal plating of Colonial tanks.
vehiclePen: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: This variant of the Bonesaw MK.3 is specially designed for use with tripod mounts. This affords it with increased stability and maximum potential range.
vehiclePen: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: The bomastone is a 'stick' style fragmentation grenade with a handle designed to aid in lobbing over moderate distances.
The venom RPG launcher fires anti-tank charges. Its simple design makes it easy to deploy, even in high-stakes operations
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.
vehiclePenChance: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: This shoulder-mounted heavy launcher is the first of its kind. It features heavy blast shielding and is capable of launching anti-tank charges over relatively large distances.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.
vehiclePenChance: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: This single-use rocket can be fired a short distance. Designed to punch holes into tanks, the ignifist is the perfect tool for infantry anticipating armored resistance.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.
vehiclePenChance: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: An anti-tank projectile fired from an R.P.G.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.
vehiclePenChance: High chance to penetrate armored vehicles.

itemDesc: An optical instrument used for viewing distant objects.
Protects against poison gas.
When attached to a gas mask, this filter provides fresh air to the wearer.
A multipurpose tool. Can be used to dismantle mines/barbed wire and unlock vehicles.
Receives map intelligence updates.
Automatically gathers map intel periodically when equipped. The radio backpack is also used to transmit other sensitive information across long distances.
Attached to the barrel of a rifle, this short blade can spear enemies in close quarters encounters.

This unique demolotion tool is a long, metal tube packed with explosives. The Hydra's Whisper is designed to destroy out-of-reach movement impairing structures and detonate any mines along the length of the tube.
damageDesc: Destroys obstacles that can otherwise only be dismantled with Wrenches

itemDesc: This heavy-duty explosive device is designed to deal significant damage to structures and stationary vehicles.
A tool used to salvage components from remains of old vehicles and equipment.

A simple mine that is placed under terrain and fitted with a pressure-sensitive plate to detonate under the weight of heavy vehicles. Mines are visible to friendlies and enemies on foot and deactivate after 48 in-game days.
A booster engine that provides thrust for launching ballistic rockets to long distant targets.
A tool for digging trenches and other entrenched structures.
A mount point for deployable infantry weapons and equipment.
Used to stem bleeding.
Used by medics to heal other soldiers.
Used by medics to revive wounded soldiers.
A blood component used to treat wounded soldiers on the battlefield.
A standard issue set of supplies for foot soldiers. Bases must be stockpiled with soldier supplies in order for players to spawn.
Supplies for maintaining structures. Store at bases to prevent decay on surrounding structures.
Supplies for maintaining structures. Store at bases to prevent decay on surrounding bunker/trench structures when garrison supplies are not available.
A portable device that mixes various materials to form Concrete, which are used to build heavily fortified structures.
A defensive emplacement against heavily armored vehicles.
This heavy artillery cannon is designed to cripple enemy fortifcations from an entrenched position. Its long heavy barrel gives the "Thunderbolt" outstanding range.
A heavy cannon designed to shatter the garrisons and fortifications of advancing forces. The Exalt is best utilized when placed into a defensive position to take advantage of its impressive range.
A light artillery cannon designed to be a fixture in defensive fortifications. The Lariat sports a formidable long-range 120mm cannon designed to put immense pressure on the enemy infantry.
An anti-aircraft flak cannon repurposed as a defensive emplacement against infantry.
A container that can carry large quantities of resources and can be transported by certain vehicles.
A container that can carry large quantities of items and can be transported by certain vehicles.
The "salus" Ambulance is efficient at transporting Critcally Wounded Soldiers and carrying medical supplies.
The Responder Ambuleance is efficient at transporting Critically Wounded Soldiers and carrying medical supplies.
Colonial Armored Cars are quick, well-rounded urban assault platforms. These anti-infantry vehicles are equipped with twin-barelled machineguns.

This complete overhaul of the T3 Armored Car is reinforced with tank armor. While these extra defenses lower the T12's overall speed and handling, the addition of treads provide increased performace in less than ideal terrain.
This "Xiphos" variant is fitted with a high-powered anti-tank turret in place of the twin machine gun platforms.
Fitted with all-terrain treads, the Highlander brings significant all-terrain mobility and performs especially well in snowy and mountainous environments.
This early O'Brein variant, the v.101 Freeman is fitted with a 360 degree ballistics cannon turret at the expense of top speed.
Warden Armoured Cars are quick, well-rounded urban assault platforms. These anti-infantry vehicles are equipped with twin-barrelled machineguns.
The "Chariot" is a transport vehicle used to shuttle personnel to the front line.
The Caravaner is a transport vehicle used to shuttle personnel to the front line.
The Battering Ram is a mobile Anti-Tank field gun firing 68mm armor piercing rounds.
Armored with heavy anti-tank rounds, the Smelter is perfect for engaging enemy armor. The frontal blast shielding providers operators with ample cover in heated skirmishes.
highVelocityBonus: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 75% extra damage per shot

itemDesc: A long range Colonial mobile artillery used to lay siege to fortified positions
A duel barrelled, high calibre anti-infantry machine gun. The "Sagittarii" is fitted with forward-facing armor plating and is excellent for suppression.
This deadly tank turns predator into prey. A tank Destroyer, the Noble Widow specializes in ambush tactics, waiting for its quarry and striking with destructive high-velocity shells
highVelocityBonus: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 75% extra damage per shot.

itemDesc: The Collins Cannon is a mobile Anti-Tank field gun firing 68mm armor-piercing rounds.
The Rampart is a high-velocity, anti-armor field cannon capable of dealing devasting damage to all but the heaviest armored vehicles while providing its crew with comprehensive ballistic shielding.
highVelocityBonus: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 115% extra damage per shot.

itemDesc: This destructive short-ranged cannon is designed for direct engagement with enemy fortifications. The Wolfhound is fitted with reinforced shielding and a 40mm barrel.
A duel barrelled, high calibre anti-infantry machine gun. The Swallowtail is fitted with forward-facing armor plating and is excellent for suppression.
highVelocityBonus: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot.

itemDesc: A heavy mobile mortar platform fitted with a thick frontal sheild for assaulting fortified locations.
A heavy duty shipping transport truck designed by Bassett Motor Society. It's built for hauling the heaviest of equipment over long distances with ease.
This "Javelin" variant is fitted with a 360 degree mortar platform, designed to support infantry in frontline operations.
Designed for escort missions and to support infantry operations, the HH-a class "Javelin" Half-Track is an armored, versatile all-terrain vehicle equipped with a mounted machinegun.
With reinforced armor at the expense of speed, the Hoplite is a formidable force in the heat of combat.
Fitted with a heavy-duty anti-tank gun, the Blinder is capable of punching through all but the most tempered of alloys.

itemName: Niska Mk. I Gun Motor Carriage
itemDesc: Designed for escort missions and to support infantry operations, the Niska Gun Motor Carriage Half-Track is an armored, versatile all-terrain vehicle equipped with a mounted machinegun.

The Scrap Hauler, designed by the Bassett Motor Society is a heavy-duty piece of machinery designed to reduce scrap matal and other materials into usable, raw resources. Scrap Haulers are often used to extract battlefield resources following skirmishes.
The Acheron is an armored amphibious vehicle designed for carrying troops across large bodies of water to aid in coordinated beach landings and flanking assaults.
With its mounted machinegun, the Doru is the perfect addition to any shoreline assault.
The Mulloy Landing Personnel Carrier is an armored amphibious vehicle designed for carrying troops across large bodies of water to aid in coordinated beach landings and flanking assaults.

The "Scorpion" HC-class tank is a moderately armored infantry support vehicle with twin, high-powered heavy machine guns and short-range radios for improved intelligence support. In addition, exterior seating is available for infantry.
highVelocityBonus: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot.

itemDesc: A highly maneuverable lightweight tank. Designed for urban environments, the "Hatchet" is fitted with a 40mm cannon.
The "Kranesca" Light Tank is fitted with an overpowered engine and a reinforced chassis, capable of boosting its top speed at the expense of overall acceleration and maneuverability.
The "Pelekys" H-class light tank is heavily modified with an open top chassis and equipped with a devastating long-range anti-tank cannon.
Designed for mass-production in Kraunia, this assault tank features a modular turret system for maximum versatility.The "Falchion" Class features a powerful if understated, 40mm cannon.

The "Spatha" assault tank features a unique and destructive 40mm turret that fires high-velocity shells. This specialized turret is not as well suited to mass-production as its more refined counterpart, the "Falchion."
highVelocityBonus: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot.

itemDesc: The HC-Class "Ballista" is a heavy tank designed to obliterate opposition defenses with its 250mm Hades Mortar Cannon.
A motorcycle and sidecar used to patrol large areas. Speed can be boosted at the cost of additional fuel.
The cab of this Motorcycle is fitted with an LMG for fast-response hit and run assaults.
The "Stolen" Tanker is a heavier R-series rig designed to transport and distribute large quantities of Fuel.
This stripped down Light Utility Vehicle provides extra seating for a small crew to engage in hit and run tactices.
This RPG-mounted Light Utility Vehicle provides a heavy-duty weapon platform with suerior speed. Perfectly suited for assaulting enemy structures and vehicles, or supporting an armored assault.
vehiclePen: Damage to the sides and rear of armored vehicles have a higher chance to penetrate at close range and at direct angles.

itemDesc: This simple, modified Utility Vehicle is fitted with a reinforced hatch to provide one crew member with increased visibility for intense recon operations.
A bombastic variant of the T12 Tankette, the "Ixion" provides its crew with more support and mounted Infantry Support Gun. Added weight from the armor results in reduced overall speed.
A heavy-duty Colonial truck used to mobilize troops and supplies.
This standard Truck is fitted with a resource hopper in place of the standard cargo hold. This allows for a much greater capacity for resources at the expense of space for cargo.

This variation of the standard R-5 Hauler is fitted with an improved suspension and axle system resulting in better overall handling. However, these improvements may not hold up under severe weather conditions.
This standard Truck is fitted with Light Machinegun in place of the passenger seat. It's well suited as an escort for convoys or lightly armored operations.
A modified Devitt fitted with a specialized Caine mortar turret at the expense of top speed.
The Ironhide Light Tank is similar to the Mk. III but reinforced with plates of heavy steel at the expense of speed and maneuverability.
A highly maneuverable lightweight tank. Designed for urban environments, the Devitt is fitted with a 40mm cannon.
The Cheiftan assault tank is fitted with asymmetrical armaments, including a 250mm mortar cannon and a twin-barreled 12.7mm turret.
highVelocityBonus: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot.

itemDesc: The Silverhand assault tank is fitted with destructive dual-barrel armaments, and heavy frontal and rear armor. Its 68mm frontal cannon is pared with a lighter 40mm turret.
A Warden Motorcycle used in patrols and fitted with a sidecar. The Kivela Power Wheel can also gain a momentary speed boost by burning additional fuel.
The Fuelrunner is a heavy Dunne rig designed to transport and distribute large quantities of Fuel.
A heavily armored variant of the King Spire, the Gallant Mk. II boasts a weighty 30mm cannon at the cost of top speed.
This small tank has been recently recommissioned to the Warden arsenal. It b oasts high maneuverability and an antenna that allows for long-range communications during high-stakes recon operations.
This LMG-mounted Light Utility Vehicle provides a heavy-duty weapons platform with superior speed. Perfectly suited for supporting flanking infantry or an armored assault.
This amphibious Light Utility Vehicle has been heavily modified to cross rivers and lakes with ease. Venturing out into the open sea is ill-advised, however.
A maltipurpose off-road Warden vehicle that can scout nearby targets.
A heavy, reinforced Dunne transport. Fitted with a heavier frame, the Leatherback is capable of enduring more punishment at the cost of initial acceleration.
This standard Truck is fitted with a resource hopper in place of the standard cargo hold. This allows for a much greater capacity for resources at the expense of space for cargo.
This standard Truck is fitted with rugged off-road treads, allowing for more efficient movement on rough terrain and conditions at the expense of maximum speed.
A heavy-duty Warden truck used to mobilize troops and supplies.
A large shipping vessel, the Aquatipper is used to transport vehicles, equipment, and personnel over large bodies of water.
The Basset Motor Society's Ironship-class shipping vessel is used to freight shippable goods and heavy vehicles.
A navel vessel designed to bombard coastal targets. The Charon is fitted with a 120mm light artillery cannon and 12.7mm Machinegun.
The Meteora Gunship replaces the machinegun with another identical 120mm artillery cannon on the bow.
A naval vessel designed to bombard coastal targets. The Ronan is fitted with a 120mm light artillery cannon and a 12.7mm Machinegun.
highVelocityBonus: Equpped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot.

itemDesc: A heavily armored vessel, the Basset Motor Society's White Whale-class troop transports can deploy on a faraway beaches to function as a permanent forward operating base.
A specialized vehicle designed by the Basset Motor Society used in the construction of large structures.
The Basset Motor Society's Class 2 Mobile Auto-Crane is used to lift and reposition vehicles and very heavy equipment.
